column2: Wall St. Bears Claw Back Into the Black (Reuters)
column3: Reuters - Short-sellers, Wall Street's dwindling\band of ultra-cynics, are seeing green again.

AP - A former dormitory converted to classrooms at the Pensacola Naval Air Station was dedicated Friday to two Columbia astronauts who were among the seven who died in the shuttle disaster Feb. 1, 2003.
Michael Phelps is named to the 4x100-meter freestyle relay team that will compete in Sunday's final, keeping alive his quest for a possible eight Olympic gold medals.

column2: Venezuelans Vote Early in Referendum on Chavez Rule (Reuters)
column3: Reuters - Venezuelans turned out early\and in large numbers on Sunday to vote in a historic referendum\that will either remove left-wing President Hugo Chavez from\office or give him a new mandate to govern for the next two\years.
